name: dijxcloud-bot
description: DijxCloud Bot for DijxCloud Discord server.

scripts.start: echo Please select one of the following: Start Production: yarn run start:production, Start Test: yarn run start:test, Start Development: yarn run start:dev
scripts.start:production: echo Select One: Linux: yarn run start:production:linux, Windows: yarn run start:production:win.
scripts.start:production:win: yarn run clear:win && yarn run production
scripts.start:production:linux: yarn run clear:linux && yarn run production

author: Liam L <TheFallenSpirit>
